title: Police: 5-year-old dies from gunshot after negligent discharge
content:
Please install the latest Adobe Flash Player Plugin to watch this content.
FORT WAYNE, Ind. (WANE) Fort Wayne police are investigating a fatal shooting that happened in the 1500 block of 4th Street Friday night.
Officers were called to a home around 10 p.m. When officers arrived, they determined that there was an apparent negligent discharge when a gun hit a 5-year-old girl in the face.
Police said the victim was taken from the scene in critical condition. According to a police spokesperson, she later died at the hospital.
Investigators are interviewing the people inside the home at the time of the shooting and are processing the crime scene.
This story will be updated as more information becomes available.
